body.title:
Data Engineer
Data Engineer with verification
body.description:
About the job
Bij BAS Consultancy werk je als Data Engineer aan uitdagende projecten bij interessante organisaties in verschillende sectoren, zoals de zakelijke markt, gezondheidszorg en publieke sector. Jij zorgt ervoor dat data wordt verzameld, geordend en omgezet in waardevolle inzichten die organisaties helpen om effici√´nter en toekomstbestendig te opereren. Of je nu binnen de private sector, de zorg of de overheid werkt, jouw expertise zorgt voor tastbare resultaten die het verschil maken.

BAS heeft voor jou:
Je bent veel zelfstandig op pad, maar dat betekent niet dat jij je BAS-collega‚Äôs nauwelijks ziet. Op onze borrels, trainingen of gezellige uitjes kom je ze regelmatig tegen. Je komt terecht in een persoonlijke, ondernemende en betrokken organisatie, waarin we graag met elkaar samenwerken.
Een vast bruto jaarsalaris tot ‚Ç¨ 64.476,-, inclusief vakantiegeld, bij een 40-urige werkweek en afhankelijk van je ervaring, of een aantrekkelijk basissalaris gecombineerd met een onbeperkt bonussysteem.
Opleidingsbudget van ‚Ç¨ 6.000,- per jaar. Dit kun je besteden aan het opleidingsinstituut Creating Insights.
De mogelijkheid om na het eerste jaar een relevante post- of executive master te volgen.
Uitbetaling van 140% voor overuren. Maak ze niet te veel, want bij BAS vinden we een goede werk-priv√©balans belangrijk.
Een mobiliteitsbudget met keuze uit een elektrische leaseauto, NS Business Card (inclusief CO2-bonus) of mobiliteitsvergoeding.
Direct een contract voor onbepaalde tijd, collectieve pensioenregeling en aantrekkelijke bonussen.
28 vakantiedagen op basis van 40 uur per week.
Toegang tot een inspirerend netwerk van hoogopgeleide en ondernemende collega's, met regelmatige trainingen, borrels en teamuitjes.

Dit ga je doen:
Samen met de business behoeften op het gebied van analytics bepalen en omzetten naar concrete oplossingen.
Verzamelen, opschonen en structureren van data uit diverse bronnen.
Ontwerpen en ontwikkelen van dashboards en rapportages met behulp van tools zoals Power BI of Tableau.
Adviseren over procesoptimalisatie en het verbeteren van dataflows binnen organisaties.
Implementeren van ETL-processen en programmeren in SQL en Python om data toegankelijk en bruikbaar te maken.

Dit bied jij BAS:
Een afgeronde hbo- of wo-opleiding richting Data Science, AI, Wiskunde, Econometrie, Business Information Management of vergelijkbaar.
Minimaal 2 jaar ervaring in een rol als Data Engineer of vergelijkbare functie.
Ervaring met het ontwikkelen van ETL-processen en programmeren in SQL en Python.
Kennis van BI-tools zoals Power BI, Tableau of vergelijkbare systemen.
Sterke analytische en communicatieve vaardigheden en een oplossingsgerichte mindset.

Organisatie
Als Data Engineer bij BAS Consultancy ben jij de drijvende kracht achter het cre√´ren en optimaliseren van Business Intelligence-omgevingen bij onze opdrachtgevers. Jij duikt in complexe datalandschappen, stemt af met verschillende afdelingen om het ideale plaatje helder te krijgen en vertaalt brondata naar begrijpelijke, gestructureerde en hoogwaardige datasets.
Je zorgt ervoor dat data niet alleen beschikbaar, maar ook bruikbaar en inzichtelijk wordt gemaakt. Dit doe je door slimme structuren en visualisaties op te zetten, waarmee organisaties data-gedreven beslissingen kunnen nemen om doelen te realiseren.

body.title:
BI Developer
BI Developer
body.description:
About the job
ABOUT US 
Oak Hall Consulting (OHC) is an energy consultancy specializing in electricity and gas market design, energy expertise provision, business, system, digital transformation and project delivery. We work with a number of clients within the energy space in Ireland, Northern Ireland and Europe. Our projects extend from setting up new energy businesses, undertaking technical, systems and operational transformation to specialist energy industry design and delivery of end to-end energy solutions.. Our broad scope of services is delivered by our core team of business analysts and consultants, supported by contracted specialists such as project and test managers.

JOB DESCRIPTION
OHC is recruiting a BI Developer on a 12-month contract (daily rate) for a client programme where OHC is operating as a strategic partner. OHC is not offering sponsorship for this role. Our energy client is growing and developing their BI and Data team, enabled partly through the implementation of a new Utilities ERP solution based on MS Dynamic's 365. The development involves replacing 4 separate systems operating across different energy types in different jurisdictions to a consolidated platform.

The successful candidate will join our clients growing BI and Data team, working on the design and development of BI reports using SQL and Power BI to meet business requirements based on data from the new system. The candidate will also be required to work with our clients data engineers to identify and resolve data quality issues and support with the development of a Data Warehouse.

The candidate will work closely with business users to define and design the reporting & BI requirements before building out the requirement using the data sources available. As well as the technical skillsets required, the ability to understand both business processes and IT/data processes will be key. The candidate, through excellent technical and communication skills, must be able to bridge the gap between business and data engineers to deliver fit for purpose solutions. The goal is to deliver high-quality reporting and insight to help drive the business towards data-driven decision-making, while working constantly with the data engineers to improve and advance our BI capabilities. As the candidate will belong to the project team involved in the implementation of a new data environment, technical experience of data transformation, ETLs, and designing/building data warehouse will be a significant advantage.

Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ Develop reports and dashboards in Power BI to meet the requirements of business users and to deliver data-driven insights that will benefit the business
‚Ä¢ Work with the business users to understand processes, define the requirements, and use your knowledge of the business data sources and data models to deliver high-quality output
‚Ä¢ Work with data engineers to ensure reports, dashboards etc are accurate, up-to-date, and fit-for purpose at all times
‚Ä¢ Liaise with business users and data engineers as and when new data is required to investigate the source, create data definitions if needed, and ensure the new data can be sourced, ingested and integrated into the data lake/warehouse
‚Ä¢ Support data engineers to develop Data Warehouse and/or other solutions to optimise BI capabilities from the new system going forward

Qualifications & Experience
‚Ä¢ Relevant 3rd level degree or Certification
‚Ä¢ 3-4 years‚Äô experience in BI and Reporting roles

Role specific (technical) knowledge / skills: 
‚Ä¢ Data Warehouse knowledge and practical experience incl. Fact & Dimension models
‚Ä¢ Excellent skills and experience in both Power BI and T-SQL are essential
‚Ä¢ Experience in documenting report requirements, data definitions, change control, and reporting processes
‚Ä¢ Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
‚Ä¢ Exceptional analytical, conceptual, and problem-solving abilities
‚Ä¢ Understanding of the Energy Utility Market a significant advantage

Benefits 
We offer competitive daily rate contracts

Work Arrangement 
Hybrid with initial part of assignment 3 days per week office based

body.title:
IT Business Analyst
IT Business Analyst with verification
body.description:
About the job
Over Buildwise
Als sterk, dynamisch en groeiend onderzoeks- en innovatiecentrum zijn wij steeds op zoek naar nieuwe collega‚Äôs die graag willen meewerken aan de toekomst! Europa moet klimaatneutraal worden tegen 2050, ons gebouwenpark staat voor een massale energetische renovatiegolf en circulair bouwen moet verder ontwikkeld worden om het gebruik van eindige hulpbronnen te beperken. Ook de productiviteit van de bouwsector moet de komende jaren sterk toenemen om concurrentieel te blijven.
Buildwise is opgericht door en voor de bouwsector en heeft als missie om bouwprofessionals te ondersteunen om de kwaliteit, productiviteit en duurzaamheid te verbeteren en de weg vrij te maken voor innovatie op werven en in bouwbedrijven.
Bij Buildwise zoeken we uitzonderlijke talenten om deze boeiende maatschappelijke en technische opportuniteiten met beide handen te grijpen en een steentje willen bijdragen aan een toekomstige groenere planeet! Of je nu een ervaren professional bent of pas afgestudeerd, je krijgt de kans om samen te werken op innovatieve en uitdagende projecten.

Jouw Missie?
 Je versterkt het bestaande team van Business Analysts binnen de IT-afdeling.
 Je speelt een sleutelrol in de digitale transformatie van Buildwise.
 Je positie stelt je in staat om de strategische prioriteiten van het bedrijf te begrijpen en actief bij te dragen aan de uitvoering van deze strategie.
Als Business Analyst draagt je actief bij aan het formaliseren en documenteren van de behoeften van de verschillende businessafdelingen. Je bent in staat om nieuwe processen voor te stellen aan de businessverantwoordelijken om het gebruik van ge√Øntegreerde IT-oplossingen (ERP, CRM, Marketing, ...) te maximaliseren.
 Als projectmanager stuurt je de implementatie van IT-oplossingen uitgevoerd door externe partners.
Je maakt integraal deel uit van het IT-team, dat bestaat uit andere Business Analysts, een Enterprise Architect en een Software Engineer.

Jouw Belangrijkste Taken:
Business Analyse:
Neemt deel aan de voorbereiding van verschillende projecten, strategische richtingen, de selectie van IT-partners en IT-oplossingen.
Draagt bij aan de transformatie van Buildwise naar een datagedreven organisatie.
Zorgt voor continue verbetering van bedrijfsprocessen en -applicaties.
Vertaalt businessbehoeften naar functionele specificaties (user stories, procesdefinities, API‚Äôs, datamodellen, wireframes, ‚Ä¶).
Werkt nauw samen met de IT-afdeling om de IT-strategie en roadmap te implementeren.
Promoot actief het gebruik van data binnen de organisatie als "data champion" en cre√´ert een datagedreven cultuur.
Adviseert de verschillende afdelingen en divisies over technologische keuzes voor ge√Øntegreerde applicaties.
Treedt op als Change agent en draagt bij aan de optimalisatie of vervanging van bestaande systemen.
Bouwt sterke relaties op met verschillende business stakeholders en externe partners.
Is verantwoordelijk voor de roadmap van ge√Øntegreerde applicaties (MS Dynamics, Dataverse, Hubspot, ...).
Centraliseert en organiseert documentatie over verschillende oplossingen ter ondersteuning van kennisdeling binnen de teams.
Projectmanagement:
Definieert de scope en maakt een eerste budgetinschatting van projecten in samenwerking met technische teams.
Stelt de planning op en volgt de voortgang van projecten (budget, deadlines).
Waarborgt de kwaliteit van oplossingen door testplannen op te stellen en uit te voeren.
Stuurt externe partijen/consultants aan en zorgt ervoor dat projecten binnen tijd, budget en kwaliteitsnormen worden opgeleverd.

Jouw Profiel:
Master in informatica, bedrijfsbeheer of een gelijkwaardig niveau.
Minimaal 5 jaar relevante ervaring als Project Manager, Product Owner, Business Analyst of in een vergelijkbare rol.
Grondige kennis van de IT-markt en inzicht in verbanden tussen domeinen: applicaties, databeheer, infrastructuur, enz.
Ervaring met projectmanagementmethodologie√´n (Prince II, PMI, Agile); certificering is een pluspunt.
Professionele ervaring met MS Dynamics Suite en in √©√©n of meer van de volgende domeinen: ERP, CRM, Marketing Suite, Content Management System.
Ervaring in het ontwerpen van gebruikersinterfaces (UX) voor applicaties.
Ervaring met datavisualisatiesoftware (MS Power BI is een pluspunt).
Leergierig en ge√Ønteresseerd in innovatieve technologie√´n en markttrends.
Ervaring met analyse van operationele processen en systemen.
Autonoom, zelfstandig en proactief.
Teamspeler.
Zeer goede kennis van Nederlands en een goede kennis van Frans. Kennis van Engels is een pluspunt.

Wat mag je van Buildwise verwachten?
Een heel gevarieerde en uitdagende job.
Een zinvolle werkomgeving voor jezelf, voor de bouwsector en de planeet.
Een open, betrokken en diverse werkplek. Waar je de kans hebt om een impact te hebben.
Ondersteuning via ons integratieproces, opleidingsmogelijkheden en expert- coaches.
Een vast contract en concurrenti√´le arbeidsvoorwaarden.
Flexibele werkuren en een telewerkbeleid voor een goed evenwicht tussen werk en priv√©. Buildwise hecht veel belang aan welzijn!
Je gaat werken vanuit onze locatie te Zaventem maar behoudt de connectie met onze andere zetels.

body.title:
Business Analyst IT (H/F)
Business Analyst IT (H/F)
body.description:
About the job
Tous nos postes sont ouverts au t√©l√©travail mais ne sont pas ouverts aux contrats freelance ni au portage salarial

Groupe ind√©pendant de conseil en transformation digitale de pr√®s de 1800 collaborateurs, N√©osoft s‚Äôest construit, depuis 2005, sur un mod√®le qui place l‚Äôexcellence, le d√©passement de soi et la RSE au c≈ìur de sa strat√©gie.
En nous rejoignant, vous int√©grez des communaut√©s d‚Äôexperts et de talents qui vous permettent de d√©velopper vos comp√©tences et d‚Äôoffrir √† nos clients le meilleur accompagnement possible.

Notre savoir-faire s‚Äôarticule autour de nos 6 domaines d‚Äôexpertise : 
Conseil & Agilit√©
Cybers√©curit√©
Data
DevOps

Nous recherchons pour int√©grer notre agence parisienne, un profil Business Analyst IT (H/F)

En int√©grant notre agence parisienne pour un client du secteur bancaire, voici des exemples de missions qui vous seront propos√©es :

üéØ Vos missions :

Cadrer fonctionnellement et piloter les sujets qui vous sont confi√©s au sein de l‚Äô√©quipe (ex : financement structur√©, conformit√©, trade finance, RGPD) : MVP / Story Map / Product Vision Board
Projet d'impl√©mentation d'une plateforme de pricing et de valorisation

Elaborer les strat√©gies de test et r√©aliser les recettes
Assurer le reporting, la communication et la documentation sur vos sujets
Assurer le bon fonctionnement des outils en production (suivi, gestion des incidents, etc.).
Expertise et connaissance des messages protocolaires des r√©seaux CB, VISA et MC.
Budg√©tisation


Environnements techniques :
MySQL / SQL / VBA
Environnement Agile
Jira

üìù Votre profil

Vous d√©tenez √† minima 8 ans d'exp√©rience professionnelle reconnue en finance/banque de d√©tail, dans laquelle vous avez pu confirmer et d√©velopper vos comp√©tences sur un poste similaire.
Vous avez une tr√®s bonne connaissance des produits financiers ainsi que le l'exp√©rience av√©r√©e sur des projets agiles, vous maitrisez l'anglais.
Sociable, p√©dagogue et diplomate, vous avez le sens des initiatives et appr√©ciez le travail en √©quipe.

üëâ Votre carri√®re chez N√©osoft 

Depuis sa cr√©ation, N√©osoft place ses collaborateurs au c≈ìur de sa strat√©gie. Notre culture pourrait se r√©sumer en un mot : le collectif.
Nos communaut√©s d‚Äôexperts vous donnent la possibilit√© d‚Äôapprendre, mais aussi de transmettre et de partager vos savoirs pour faire progresser les autres.
Nous veillons √† ce que chacun b√©n√©ficie d‚Äôun accompagnement de proximit√© et d‚Äôun suivi de carri√®re personnalis√© aupr√®s de votre manager d√©di√© :
1 bilan d‚Äôactivit√© trimestriel pour suivre le d√©veloppement de vos comp√©tences
1 entretien d‚Äô√©valuation qui a lieu chaque ann√©e pour √©valuer votre performance et d√©terminer vos nouveaux objectifs
1 entretien annuel aupr√®s de votre RH dans le but de cartographier vos nouvelles comp√©tences pour √©changer sur vos projets professionnels et souhaits de formation

üëâ Vos avantages

Formations et d√©veloppement de l‚Äôexpertise : 

Vous disposez de temps allou√© et r√©mun√©r√© en contribuant au d√©veloppement de votre expertise technique et de celle du groupe (Participation √† des Tech days, animation d‚Äôune conf√©rence √† l‚Äôinterne ou √† l‚Äôexterne, r√©daction d‚Äôarticles, rencontres avec nos candidats en processus de recrutement‚Ä¶)
Un abonnement illimit√© LinkedIn Learning offert

Bien-√™tre au travail : 

Un accord de t√©l√©travail flexible jusqu‚Äô√† 100% de t√©l√©travail et personnalisable
Un partenariat avec Gymlib qui favorise le sport en entreprise
Des initiatives locales (afterworks, d√©fis sportifs, team buildings, ‚Ä¶)

Et bien plus encore : 

Parce que les meilleurs cooptent les meilleurs, une politique de cooptation attractive r√©mun√©r√©e d√®s l‚Äôarriv√©e du collaborateur
En plus de votre salaire : participation, compte √©pargne temps, actionnariat...

üëâ Votre parcours candidat

Notre processus de recrutement se compose de deux √©tapes cl√©s :
Un entretien de recrutement RH avec un Talent Acquisition Sp√©cialist pour dresser un bilan de votre parcours professionnel et identifier les trajectoires de carri√®re possibles au sein de notre groupe
Un entretien d‚Äô√©valuation technique pour r√©aliser un diagnostic de vos comp√©tences techniques et identifier les comp√©tences sur lesquelles poursuivre votre √©volution

Vous aurez √©galement la possibilit√© de rencontrer pour compl√©ter votre processus un acteur de notre p√¥le Business ou un pair de votre m√©tier pour √©changer sur son exp√©rience collaborateur.

Nous avons h√¢te de vous rencontrer !

body.title:
Business Analyst
Business Analyst

Data Analyst / Power BI
Data Analyst / Power BI
body.description:
About the job
We are searching for a Data Analyst / Power BI to strengthen our Microsoft-Team! To join them in working on new upcoming projects.

LACO is a Belgian-based business intelligence and data analytics company that exist for more than 35 years now. We are a Microsoft Data & AI Solutions Partner with extensive expertise in various areas, including Microsoft BI and Data Governance. With over 120 consultants, we are dedicated to helping businesses succeed with data. We blend dedication with a dash of fun in everything we do.

At LACO, we value long-term relationships with both our clients and colleagues. We have recently secured several large projects with key clients, and to support these, we are looking to strengthen our Microsoft team to deliver end-to-end projects alongside the LACO team.

YOUR JOB
As a Data Analyst/Power BI Expert at LACO, you‚Äôll be responsible for:
Understanding and mapping out the requirements of the business.
Collecting, cleaning and pre-processing data from various sources.
Working closely with cross-functional teams and leveraging your expertise in Power BI to create compelling visualizations and reports.
Designing, optimizing, and developing Power BI reports and dashboards to meet business needs and requirements.
Working closely with stakeholders to gather and understand data requirements, ensuring data accuracy and consistency.
Troubleshooting and resolving issues with Power BI reports, transforming complex data sets into meaningful insights through the creation of data visualizations.
Staying up to date with the latest Power BI Microsoft Fabric features and best practices to excel in this role.

YOUR SKILLS
You have a Bachelor‚Äôs and/or Master‚Äôs degree in computer science or equivalent.
You have an analytical mindset.
You have at least 3 years proven experience as a Power BI Developer or a similar role.
You know all about the programming languages SQL, DAX and Python.
You can model data using Kimball, Dimensional Modelling and Data Vault.
You are proficient in Power BI, including DAX, data modelling and custom visuals.

You get even more bonus points if ‚Ä¶
You have a good knowledge of Azure Synapse, Data Factory, and Databricks.
You are familiar with diverse types of data storage for structured data.
You are a strong communicator with teamwork abilities.
You are fluent in Dutch and/or French and English.

OUR OFFER
We‚Äôre open to work with Employees and Freelancers
Receive an attractive salary package, along with excellent benefits.
Training opportunities to enhance your knowledge and advance your career in your chosen field.
Be involved in innovative Microsoft tracks that challenge and inspire you.
A great company culture with room for fun events such as: family day, yearly ski trip, sports events, game nights, ‚Ä¶

Don‚Äôt let this opportunity slip through your data fingers! Get in touch with our Talent Acquisition team and embark on your adventure to success.

body.title:
Technical fraud analyst
Technical fraud analyst with verification
body.description:
About the job
A job in one glance

Do you want to fully understand a job and organization before committing, or would you rather let curiosity drive you to discover more through direct contact? We believe in the latter and proudly introduce concise job listings.

We are seeking a Fraud Analyst for DataExpert to join the DetACT team. If you're passionate about cybersecurity and keen on making our digital and financial world safer, this role could be a perfect fit.

Your Needs:
- A knowledge-driven team with experienced colleagues.
- Hybrid work opportunities.
- Working with international clients.

What You'll Receive (based on skills and experience):
- Salary ranging from ‚Ç¨3000 to ‚Ç¨4000 gross per month.
- Excellent secondary benefits.
- Access to various training and educational opportunities.

About the Team:
- An ambitious player in cybersecurity, phishing, and bank fraud.
- A small and close-knit team with an informal working atmosphere.
- In Delft, DataExpert offers a challenging workplace within a reputable organization.

We understand this listing is brief and may not answer all your questions. Feel free to apply, and I will reach out to you as soon as possible.

About the job

Experiencia en comunicaci√≥n efectiva con stakeholders digitales.
Experiencia t√©cnica en colaboraci√≥n con desarrolladores y APIs, entendimiento de arquitectura cloud y modelado de datos: se valora la experiencia en trabajar estrechamente con equipos de desarrollo, comprendiendo los requisitos t√©cnicos del proyecto y colaborando en la integraci√≥n de APIs y sistemas para garantizar la funcionalidad y la interoperabilidad del producto digital en el contexto de pr√©stamos, as√≠ como la capacidad para comprender y contribuir al dise√±o de arquitecturas cloud y al modelado de datos para optimizar el rendimiento y la escalabilidad del producto.

üè° Medidas de conciliaci√≥n (horario flexible, teletrabajo, asesoramiento de especialistas (psic√≥logo, nutricionista, entrenador personal), jornada intensiva los viernes y en verano seg√∫n proyecto).

En UST nos comprometemos con la igualdad de oportunidades en nuestros procesos de selecci√≥n y no realizamos ning√∫n tipo de discriminaci√≥n por raz√≥n de raza, g√©nero, discapacidad, edad, religi√≥n, orientaci√≥n sexual o nacionalidad. body.title:
Data Analyst
Data Analyst
body.description:
About the job
Job Title: Data Analyst 
Location: Ghent, Belgium

Overview:
As a Data Analyst, you support the energy transition by optimizing the design, implementation, and integration of technological solutions for proactive investment in distribution networks. You collaborate internally and externally to align policy, budgets, and opportunities, focusing on spatial and asset information within the GIS system.

Key Responsibilities:
Align GIS data with municipal and utility projects.
Ensure efficient data management to support policy and investment decisions.
Analyze and translate business needs into functional requirements.
Identify and implement best practices for data optimization.
Support the Asset Planning team with data-driven insights and recommendations.
Lead or contribute to projects with information or process impacts.
Act as a liaison between stakeholders and maintain organizational coherence.
Monitor and improve documentation, training, and communication processes.
Skills & Expertise:

Demonstrable experience with GIS systems.
Experience with Databricks.
Proficiency in Power BI for data visualization and analysis.
Programming skills in Python.
Analytical, organizational, and project management capabilities.
Knowledge of Asset Management and utility networks.
Strong communication and collaboration skills.
Language Requirements:
Proficiency in Dutch at a B2-level is required.

body.title:
Junior Power BI Developer
Junior Power BI Developer
body.description:
About the job
ESPRIMO Srl, societ√† di consulenza informatica che opera dal 2002 su tutto il territorio nazionale ed internazionale, a supporto delle imprese, si colloca nel settore dell‚ÄôInformation Technology proponendosi come obiettivo quello di fornire una vasta gamma di prodotti, servizi e soluzioni nelle aree pi√π strategiche per l‚Äôimpresa, come: Infrastrutture IT, Content Management, ERP, Business Intelligence, CRM, Web Applications, √® alla ricerca di n¬∞ 1:


Junior Power BI Developer


Requisiti richiesti:
Esperienza di almeno 1/2 anni nel ruolo
Buona conoscenza funzionale di Microsoft Power BI;
Buona padronanza della lingua inglese;
Conoscenza della copertura dei processi aziendali da parte di alcuni dei principali ERP (Microsoft, SAP, Oracle vendor);
Buona conoscenza della metodologia di data testing/squaring.


Sede operativa: Remoto, con eventuale presenza sporadica (su specifiche necessit√† progettuali) su Roma.


Si offre un inserimento in un contesto stimolante e innovativo, con grandi prospettive di crescita professionale e una retribuzione commisurata all'esperienza.

Si richiede l‚Äôinvio di Curricula rispondenti al profilo della posizione aperta, verranno presi in considerazione solo quelli effettivamente in possesso dei requisiti sopraindicati.

La ricerca √® rivolta ad entrambi i sessi (L.903/77). Inviare dettagliato curriculum vitae, con l‚Äôautorizzazione al trattamento dei dati personali secondo la Legge 196/2003.

Business Analyst / Product Owner Plataformas Globales SME (100% remoto desde Espa√±a)
Business Analyst / Product Owner Plataformas Globales SME (100% remoto desde Espa√±a)

body.title:
IT Business Analyst
IT Business Analyst with verification
body.description:
About the job
Dans les ann√©es √† venir, plusieurs d√©fis attendent ORES : accompagnement de la transition du march√© √©nerg√©tique et ses implications, compteurs intelligents, augmentation du flux des √©changes de donn√©es, gestion de partages d‚Äô√©nergie, etc.

Au sein du d√©partement Informatique, ORES est actuellement √† la recherche d‚Äôun IT Business Analyste fonctionnel.

Le Business Analyste fonctionnel garantit l‚Äôanalyse et la documentation des solutions bas√©es sur les sp√©cifications m√©tiers, ainsi que le testing de ces solutions et le support aux utilisateurs cl√©s.

Mission:

Responsable de l‚Äôanalyse et de la documentation
‚Ä¢ R√©diger les Sp√©cifications M√©tiers sur base des besoins exprim√©s et des processus TO-BE fournis par les Parties prenantes M√©tiers et traduire les Sp√©cifications M√©tiers en SFDs (Sp√©cifications Fonctionnelles D√©taill√©es).
‚Ä¢ Assurer une coh√©rence entre les besoins et la solution imagin√©e.
‚Ä¢ R√©diger syst√©matiquement, la documentation fonctionnelle des solutions.


Responsable de la collaboration avec les autres parties prenantes
‚Ä¢ Collaborer avec les Parties prenantes M√©tiers et les architectes de solution afin de s‚Äôassurer que le document SFD couvre l‚Äôensemble de la demande formul√©e dans les Sp√©cifications M√©tiers et le cadrage de la solution ;
‚Ä¢ Collaborer avec les analystes business et fonctionnels des autres √©quipes pour lesquelles une d√©pendance a √©t√© identifi√©e ;
‚Ä¢ Collaborer avec les √©quipes de d√©veloppement :
o S‚Äôassurer de leur bonne compr√©hension des besoins.
o Valider la traduction des sp√©cifications fonctionnelles en impl√©mentation technique.
o Collaborer √† l‚Äôestimation de la charge de d√©veloppement n√©cessaire.
o Suivre continuellement les d√©veloppements


Responsable de l‚Äôex√©cution des activit√©s de test
‚Ä¢ Pr√©parer et ex√©cuter les tests d‚Äôint√©gration et les tests fonctionnels.
‚Ä¢ Suivre les r√©sultats des tests d'acceptance
‚Ä¢ Analyser et poser un diagnostic sur les incidents et probl√®mes issus des tests dont il a la charge et y apporter les corrections n√©cessaires.


Comp√©tences :
Vous disposez d‚Äôun Master √† orientation informatique, ou √©quivalent par exp√©rience.
Vous avez une exp√©rience d‚Äôau minimum 2 ans en tant qu‚Äôanalyste business ou fonctionnel.
Vous avez de bonnes capacit√©s d‚Äôanalyse, de gestion des besoins et de chiffrage de solutions.
Dans le cadre de projets, vous pourriez √™tre amen√© √† coordonner une √©quipe d'analystes fonctionnels IT.
Vous avez des comp√©tences li√©es aux tests d‚Äôint√©gration et fonctionnels, √† la fois en terme de r√©daction et d‚Äôex√©cution de cas de tests.
Vous avez une exp√©rience dans l‚Äôutilisation d‚Äôun outil de testing (HPQC, Azure devOps ou √©quivalent).
Vous avez une exp√©rience dans l‚Äôutilisation d‚Äôun outil de gestion de backlog (Azure DevOps, Jira ou √©quivalent).
Vous disposez de connaissances globales en mati√®re de base de donn√©es relationnelle et du langage SQL.
Vous avez une connaissance de l‚Äôenvironnement Microsoft Azure et de ses composants (Application Insights, Service Bus, Storage accounts, DB SQL, Data factories).
Vous √™tes capable de formaliser une analyse fonctionnelle dans les diff√©rents diagrammes UML.
Vous pouvez interpr√©ter et comprendre un diagramme BPMN.
Vous avez une exp√©rience en m√©thodologie bas√©e sur une approche Agile (SCRUM ou autre).
Vous avez une exp√©rience avec un outil de mod√©lisation (Sparx EA ou √©quivalent) .
Vous √™tes autonome, orient√© objectifs et avez l'esprit d'initiative.
Votre bonne communication est un de vos atouts.

body.title:
Technical Business Analyst
Technical Business Analyst
body.description:
About the job
IT Business Analyst - 3-4 years experience required

My Dublin based client is a large corporate firm and they are looking for an IT Business Analyst. The ideal candidate will be an excellent communicator and is eager to join a firm with great career progression. WFH options are in place along with a hybrid work model. They are very flexible and the role is 2/3 days on site and 2/3 days from home.

Job Responsibilities
You will play an important role in workshops and gain and sustain trust of key business and technology stakeholders
Strong stakeholder Management skills
Work alongside a dynamic team of developers and have good industry implementation background.
Strong written and verbal communication across all levels
Must have good Agile/ Scrum skills and experience
Experience of IS systems, processes and change is highly desirable
Creative and critical thinker

Experienced Required
3-4 years experience as a Business Analyst
Strong presentation skills are essential
Ability to manage and engage at all levels of stakeholder management
Previous consultancy experience
Works closely with Lead solution architects to ensure that the solution proposed meets the requirements and the anticipated benefits, including compliance to statutory and company policies and procedures.
Get up and go attitude with a passion for learning and implementing new concepts.
Leadership and collaborative interpersonal skills to engage and motivate team members.

Educational Requirements
Third level degree in relevant field
Any certifications nice to have

Benefits:
Pension
Healthcare
Gym
Training and Development
Career progression
One of Ireland's leading Employers


HOW TO APPLY:
If you are interested in this role, please apply for this role with your updated CV.

body.title:
Data Engineer (AWS Specialist)
Data Engineer (AWS Specialist)
body.description:
About the job
Highlights 
Position: Data Integration Engineer (AWS Specialist)
Location: Builtrix Office - Lisbon & Hybrid
Experience Level: Minimum 3 years of professional experience.
Evaluation method: 3 stages of interview including 1 technical, 1 challenge assignment, and 1 team culture interview. We expect this process to take between 2 to 3 weeks from the first interview to communication of the results.
Salary level: The salary level depends on the experience and skillset.
Start date: As soon as possible.

About Builtrix
At Builtrix, we are transforming the way utility data is collected, understood, and utilized. Our mission is to empower energy experts, ESG consultants, and facility managers with meaningful and standardized energy insights. Our culture is to build our small team of amazing people who can demonstrate outstanding performances while learning and growing their skills exponentially every year. Join us in shaping a greener and cleaner future through cutting-edge technology and innovation.

Role Overview
We are looking for a passionate and skilled Data Engineer to join our product team. As Builtrix is growing its customer base in Portugal and Europe, this role is important in ensuring seamless integration of data from multiple sources, processing it efficiently, and enabling meaningful insights.
Your day to day activities look like:
meetings with the product team and contributing in planning the next sprints.
considering the data integration requirements based on the API / Server / Data lake / Database requirements and documentations
developing new features on the ETL process and data pipeline
testing the ETL performance and reporting the key metrics to product leader for the next upgrades
monitoring the data pipeline behavior and building automated reports on missing data and blocked connectors
reviewing the process costs and exploring cost reduction opportunities
Success in this position will be measured by:
How fast the data integration developments are made.
How efficiently the data pipeline including the connectors, processors, and storage system operate to:
make sure continuous high quality data ingestion and export
reduce the cost of cloud infrastructure (e.g., AWS).
If you are someone who thrives on working with complex data ecosystems and is excited by the challenge of improving energy efficiency and sustainability, we want you on our team!

Key Responsibilities
Cloud Integration:
Design and implement data integration pipelines from diverse sources, including cloud platforms, legacy building management systems (BMS/EMS), and IoT systems. The pipeline may include some unstructured processes such as scrapping and/or reading data from uploaded CSV/PDF files.
Ensure robust and secure data exchange mechanisms at both data exchange and control/automation levels.
ETL Processes:
Build and maintain efficient ETL workflows to process, clean, and transform data for analytics and operational use.
Handle both batch and real-time data processing requirements effectively.
Cloud Infrastructure Management:
Leverage AWS services such as Transfer Family, API Gateway, Lambda, Athena, S3, EC2, RDS and others to develop scalable solutions.
Ensure systems are optimized for performance, security, and cost-efficiency.
Data Analytics:
Collaborate with the product team to support analytics and machine learning initiatives.
Enable API-based data access for customers using RESTful API frameworks.
Data Security:
Ensure best practices in data security and compliance with industry standards.

Requirements
Experience:
A minimum of 3 years of professional experience in data engineering or a related field such as backend development.
At least 1 year of hands-on experience with AWS cloud services.
Technical Skills:
Proficiency in working with cloud-based infrastructures, particularly AWS.
Strong knowledge of data integration tools and protocols.
Strong knowledge of databases.
Strong knowledge of coding in Python.
Strong knowledge of data and cloud infrastructure security.
Experience in designing ETL pipelines for batch and real-time processing.
Soft Skills:
Passion for data analytics and sustainability.
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a collaborative environment.
Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills
Team working, Entrepreneurial spirit and can-do attitude
Fluent English language 
Other:
Comprehensive understanding of data security principles.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.
Fluency in reading and writing in Portuguese is a plus
Knowledge in the field of energy is a plus.
Knowledge in the field of ontologies and system interoperability is a plus.

What We Offer
A dynamic and innovative work environment.
Opportunity to contribute to sustainable energy solutions.
Competitive compensation and benefits.
Flexible hybrid working options.
Professional growth and learning opportunities.
Annual budget to spend on professional growth.
Participating in international technological events and exhibitions
For more information about us, visit www.builtrix.tech  or reach us at info@builtrix.tech
Notice: we are not interested in outsourcing the hiring.

body.title:
Data Analyst / Data Engineer
Data Analyst / Data Engineer with verification
body.description:
About the job
Join our growing international team at Yieldigo, a leader in pricing optimization with a strong presence from Prague's CTU to Silicon Valley. Do you enjoy working with data and seeing it as more than just numbers? Then why not become our new Data Analyst / Data Engineer?

Who are we?

We're Yieldigo, offering clients software that allows them to efficiently manage the pricing of goods in both physical stores and e-shops. We started as a startup, but have grown into a mature company utilized by retail chains in 11 countries worldwide. We are now heading into the next phase of our go-to-market strategy with a strategic partner who will sell our software in North America. This brings increased demands on the existing team as well as new reinforcements.

And what about you? 

‚úÖ Do you enjoy reading and analyzing data, and can you explain the findings in simple terms?
‚úÖ Are you comfortable talking to people and looking for solutions where others see only obstacles?
‚úÖ Do you want to do meaningful work where you can see the results first hand and where you are not merely a cog in a corporate machine?

If you ticked 3 times ‚úÖ, then read on!

What will you do here? 

As the master of data at Yieldigo, you will become a valuable asset to Alina's team, our Onboarding Director. You will be responsible for ensuring the quality of processed client data, identifying opportunities to automate processes, and contributing to the overall improvement of our integration processes. Working with data will enable you to uncover insights that might otherwise go unnoticed and to think strategically in terms of business objectives.

How do we picture you?

This is not a junior role; we‚Äôre looking for candidates with proven experience, independence and problem-solving skills.
You can interpret data findings and draw conclusions in simple terms that are clear to everyone, and to find business logic in data.
You enjoy communicating with people, explaining problems in a structured manner, and proposing solutions.
Your knowledge of Python is at least at an advanced level.
You can use Pandas library to transform, clean and analyze data.
We will be over the moon if your SQL (PostgreSQL) skills go beyond the ordinary.
English proficiency at C1 level or higher.

What's in it for you?

üåé A great international team that tackles problems like adults
üíª Mac or PC
üí∞ Salary proportional to seniority
üåü Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP) for the exceptional workers
üå¥ 5 weeks of holiday
ü•µ Sick days in case you feel under the weather
‚òéÔ∏è Phone plan
üè° Flexibility and the option for hybrid work
üèãÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Multisport card
üó£ English lessons
üìú Conferences and training courses
üé≥ Team events
üè¢ Offices in the center of Prague

body.title:
Business Analyst
Business Analyst with verification
body.description:
About the job
Nexeo is currently looking for a Business Analyst for one of the leaders within the Energy industry in Belgium.

Nexeo Belgium is a consultancy company that supports its clients in the banking, finance and insurance sectors in all phases of their transformation projects: from business consulting to the implementation of IT solutions. 


As a consultant you will have the opportunity to be part of Nexeo:
International environment ( Offices in France, Belgium, Luxembourg, Switzerland & Canada)
+ 450 employees
over 20% growth each year

As Business Analyst, you will be responsible of the following tasks:
Identify and evaluate business requirements for the asset management of renewable energy systems, integrating them into the electrical grid and power markets, and facilitating renewable energy trading.
Write functional requirements documents for the specific asset management systems and the specific contract management and trading systems needed for renewable energy systems.
Write test cases that cover the same functional scope, ensuring correct implementation of the functional requirements as documented, and satisfaction of the corresponding business requirements.
Create functional documentation covering the delivered systems. It should cater to both users and support personnel, from low-level documentation to high-level documentation.

Profile
In-depth knowledge of power markets, with expertise in renewable technologies and their specificities with regard to asset management and energy trading.
Python and SQL skills with experience in software development, data science or related fields.
Familiarity with cloud tools (e.g., AWS) and relational databases.
Experience in trading or operating assets in wholesale and/or ancillary service markets is a plus

Working for Nexeo
A very attractive salary package
Interesting carreer opportunities
Ambitious goals are encouraged
A lot of fun

If you‚Äôre motivated, flexible, open minded and ready to be a Nexeo Consultant this function of Business Analyst is made for you!

@Business Analyst @Python @SQL @AWS @Energy @E2E @Freelance @Long Term @Brussels
